name: CodeSync
short_description: Real-time collaborative coding environment with integrated whiteboard and AI chat.
detailed_description: Built real-time collaborative coding with whiteboard and AI chat using Gemini API
Optimized sync latency by 30% using Liveblocks and Convex reactive database
Implemented conflict-free resolution, reducing editing conflicts by 50%
Designed role-based permissions for room owners to manage user access

name: Hackverse
short_description: Scalable hackathon platform with secure RBAC and optimized database architecture.
detailed_description: Developed secure RBAC using Passport.js, NestJS guards, and decorators
Designed normalized PostgreSQL schema with Prisma ORM for efficient data storage
Built full-stack app with PostgreSQL, Next.js, and NestJS for scalability
Implemented Redux for consistent global state management
